title: Fort Knox of security
extract: be like Fort Knox. To be inaccessible, usually because the item or place in question is locked or guarded. Fort Knox is a military site in Kentucky where stores of gold are kept. ... I can't get into the safe, it's like Fort Knox!
extract_html: be like Fort Knox. To be inaccessible, usually because the item or place in question is locked or guarded. Fort Knox is a military site in Kentucky where stores of gold are kept. ... I can't get into the safe, it's like Fort Knox!
